name: StarLink 1.0
description:
REMEMBER TO ALWAYS PLAY WITH ULTRA GRAPHICS QUALITY, YOUR NATIVE SIZE AND FULLSCREEN, IF NOT THE GAME MAY NOT WORK.

Fight against an unknown species of aliens in a spaceship with no gravity and escape through a escape pod with the necessary resources. There are multiple rooms to explore and choose 2 of the 3 available guns to defeat your enemies. 

Input list is available in-game. Only available in English.

This was made for a school project, so expect a few issues or missing features in it.
